entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Old Crow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -43.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Old Crow Airport 07:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -43.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 62 %
Dewpoint: -47.7°C
Wind: WSW 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 42.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Ice fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 42. Wind chill minus 49 this morning and minus 56 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 42.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 42. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
